Which sector, in your opinion, plays the most important role in driving the economic condition of a country? Please elaborate with reasons and examples.

In every country's development, economy plays a vital role in all aspects of its growth in all the sectors. Where this economy inturns depends upon various vital factors which deals into its foresite development.

Economy of a country not only depents upon the renewable or non-renewable resourses but also onto the human resourses as well. Where the earlier resourses are consisting of the man made & natural resourses which are into daily consumption by a nation via export or imports of goods like of food items, fuel, automobiles, clothes & building material. On the otherhand, the Human resourses maintains the economy of a nation in various forms like of employeed & unemployeed citizen, ration of poverty with impoverty, the level of education rate into various regions of a country along with the political aspects.

The economy of a nation also inturn effected by the economy of the world as it all depends upon the investores of money in different sectors. The stock exchange of the nation as well as world wide, shows the picture of economic flactuations.  It works on the criteria that 'More the goodwill a nation owns in the form of its citizens those can invest & spend money into the market, either by earning of an individual's education & their skills development, More better will be the economy of a nation.'

We all have seen the big economy downfall in the year 2008-2009 when recession hit all the nations world wide, where people lost their jobs & earning by the downfall into the demand & supply of the end material, where IT sector had been effected the most but the consumer durables were some how floated well into this situation. 

During the normal flactuations also, either the gold prices rises & the sensex goes down or a vise versa, effecting the economy.
Again in the current situiation, the marget is not so stagnent & recession can hit it any time as prices of every consumer durables is rising on a regular note, companies are some how using their older resourses to survive through their network but still the situations is at same stage where the demand is low & the production has already being gather a lot into its relative godowns steping up towards the recession & inturn bringing up the need to take collective measures by globle thinkers to survive the world.
